Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and Antibiofilm Activity of UP-5, an Ultrashort Antimicrobial Peptide Designed Using Only Arginine and Biphenylalanine.
Literature.Author: Almaaytah A, Qaoud MT, Khalil Mohammed G, Abualhaijaa A, Knappe D, Hoffmann R, Al-Balas Q

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:1% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=125 µM,Human erythrocytes:3% Hemolysis=150-200 µM,Vero cells:IC50=275 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC50=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=15µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MBC=15µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MIC=15µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MBC=15µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MBC=10µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC BAA-2316(MIC=70µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC BAA-2316(MBC=70µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=55µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=55µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=60µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MBC=60µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=65µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=65µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-2114(MIC=55µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-2114(MBC=55µM)
